title: 1960s Batman Series Font
content:
Looking for this exact box-y font featured at the end of an episode, any ideas?

Have found similar ones but not identical.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112110im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-03-12%20at%203_4279.03.27%20PM.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112110im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-03-12%20at%203_4132.03.37%20PM.png)

Font: 

 Ad Lib 

Solved By: 

 [Nick Cooke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112110/http:/typophile.com/user/3834 "View user profile.")
author: texlexmex

comments.content:
I was just editing the post:

Hand lettered; different styles of similar characters, but Ad Lib is fairly close.

You're welcome.
